title: Patch 6.4 is live.
body: Patch 6.4 is now live in OCE. If you discover any issues or bugs after patching please post them here and we'll investigate.

replies.poster: T I G A S A O
replies.body:
Hi 
When I updated today I was still on patch 6.3 and couldnt log in to the OCE server can you please help?
It said that the server rejected the patch 6.3 or something 
Thanks

Try this:

1) Navigate to the following folder, if on C Drive:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects

2) Delete the folder name lol_patcher

3) Restart the patcher.
I did exactly what you recommended, but its still rejecting my client
i did the same. deleted the file repatched the game and still got same error
Ok, on the patcher window press the "?" button in the top right and select "Repair".

Why am i unable to Start a game whenever i try in the loading screen the game freezes then closes itself and if i actually get into the game after about 1 minute it spikes and then closes itself again PLEASE I BEG YOU FIX THIS BECAUSE ITS GETTING ON MY NERVES. I've tried everything to fix this issue but nothing is working.

Try the following:

1) Download the Hextech Toolkit [here](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi).
2) Install and open it.
3) Select "Use Public" under DNS and press Start. This will create a LoL logs zip folder on your desktop.
4) Try getting into a custom game.
5) If that does not succeed, [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new). When doing so attach the logs zip that was created in step 3 and select "r3d logs attached" when submitting the ticket.
I have windows 10 and my lol cant login and I have an error that the patch that I have is 6.3 . how I can have the 6.4 they don t update automaticly??
I have windows 10 and my lol cant login and I have an error that the patch that I have is 6.3 . how I can have the 6.4 they don t update automaticly??

So i have a bit of an issue with the whole give people the dominion icon, the entire time we have had the OCE Serve we havent been able to play dominion at all other than custom games. So he in OCE the only people who would get the icon would be the people who had played dominion on NA or EU servers before moving over to OCE. This has really annoyed me due to the fact that i enjoyed dominion and couldnt play it. Also where every other server have Twisted Treeline open and we only get to play it on a scheduled basis and dont even get the 3v3 ranked either, what is the issue with that, i think its a little sad TBH.

Riot doesnt really care about us dude, they only actually give a shit about NA players :/
Its really disheartening at times
Sadly, I have to agree with you on that, we are just the test dummies for riot, they dont really care about the lower servers.
Its the worst because I've had to uninstall and reinstall LoL 3 times today already, and its still not working after literally 12 hours of trying to make it work :/
Illuminati is all over league of legends
So...any notice of blood moon yasuo? {{champion:157}}

client version 6.3.16_02_05_12_04 is rejected by server

just downloaded the patch and got that error when i tried to log in
There's a typo at the bottom of the patch notes. It says "Nidalle" instead of "Nidalee".
